summary: Header and footer were updated to use a centralized branding config that points to the user-provided logo path. However, the diff summary does not show the required static image assets being added under frontend/public, nor does it provide concrete evidence that frontend/index.html was updated and that the favicon/apple-touch/OG assets exist and load.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the user-provided logo image asset exists in the deployed frontend static assets and is loadable at `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows code referencing `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png`, but does not show `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` being added/modified, so asset existence/loadability cannot be verified from the provided changes.

missing_requirements.requirement: No remaining references to `/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png` are used for the header/footer branding image in the codebase.
missing_requirements.reason: While SiteHeader and SiteFooter now use the new path via BRANDING config, the diff summary does not provide a repo-wide search or evidence that no other header/footer branding references to the old logo remain elsewhere.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all brand/SEO icon assets referenced in `frontend/index.html` exist and load correctly from the deployed site (favicon, apple touch icon, og image).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary mentions `frontend/index.html` is wired to new brand assets only in a text summary, but does not include the actual `frontend/index.html` diff content or any added/modified files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` for the favicon/apple-touch/og image assets, so existence and correct references cannot be confirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a centralized branding configuration module (`frontend/src/config/branding.ts`) as a single source of truth for logo and SEO assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest requires correcting logo/icon usage and ensuring assets exist, but does not request adding a new branding configuration layer/module.
